Activity: Morning routine: Arrive, coffee, check emails, browse social media (briefly!).
Review the code implemented so far. Refactor and optimize for performance. A well-organized codebase is a happy codebase.
Implement a basic save/load system for the settings panel options. Allow the player to save their preferences and load them when the game starts.
Meet with @qtest-1 (QA Tester) to discuss the UI elements and feedback systems. Get feedback on usability, clarity, and overall effectiveness.
Lunch! Maybe go for a walk in the park to clear my head.
Address the feedback from @qtest-1. Fix any bugs, improve the UI, and make the feedback systems more user-friendly.
Add more advanced settings options (e.g., graphics settings, audio channels, input remapping).
Implement a system for tracking player progress and achievements. Display achievement notifications in the UI.
Commit changes to Git. Write a detailed commit message.
Wrap up the day. Prepare for the end-of-week review.
Head home. Maybe catch a movie with friends.
